title: Bloomberg Launches Green Bond-Tilted Versions of its Flagship Fixed Income Indices - ESG Today
summary: Bloomberg has launched new green-tilted versions of its fixed income indices, including the Global Aggregate, Treasury, and Corporate Indices, aimed at enhancing sustainable investments. The surge in green bond issuance reflects companies and governments financing environmental sustainability initiatives, with record volumes reached this year. These new indices allow for customization to meet specific investor needs, including the option to focus on sustainable investments. The year-to-date return for these new indices shows potential additional returns for sustainability-focused investors.
green_innovation: TRUE: The launch of new green-tilted fixed income indices aligns with the principles of green innovation by promoting sustainable investments and supporting environmental goals through financial products.

product_or_process: 20% Green Bond and 3x Green Bond Tilted indices
